name: Galactic Chase
description:
You are an alien who must get through a lab to save "your human" girlfriend. 

This is for The Coding Sucks Game Jam. 

Controls: WASD to move. You can pickup and move certain objects (such as boxes) by left clicking and holding/dragging the mouse.  

This fits the theme by you needing to save your "human girlfriend" from whoever kidnapped both her and the alien(the Player).
